name: academy-sidebar-widget
description: Academy Sidebar Widget - Navigation and persona management for Academy system

widget_capabilities.room_navigation: Switch between General, Academy, Synthesis Lab, Genome Discovery rooms
widget_capabilities.persona_overview: View active Academy personas with status indicators
widget_capabilities.session_tracking: Real-time session cost and usage monitoring
widget_capabilities.quick_interactions: One-click persona focus and room switching
widget_capabilities.status_indicators: Online/working/offline status for personas and Academy system
widget_capabilities.cost_monitoring: Session cost tracking with request count and pricing

integration_points.chat_widget: Sends room-change events to ChatWidget for seamless integration
integration_points.personas_widget: Dispatches persona-focus events for detailed persona interactions
integration_points.academy_daemon: Real-time connection status and Academy system health
integration_points.base_widget: Extends BaseWidget with declarative HTML/CSS architecture
